01/about
01/ about

Hello! My name is Khaled Saied and I create websites & online applications. Technology has always been a part of my life. Ever since I was a kid, I have been fascinated by the ever-evolving world of tech and have consistently sought out ways to expand my knowlege. Read more ...

Although I have a bachelor's degree in Business Administration and worked in this field for a year, I soon realized my true passion was for web development and decided to pursue a career in the tech industry.

Since 2019, I have built a strong foundation in front-end and some backend web technologies and have developed my skills by helping small businesses build an online presence and constantly working on personal projects.

I am currently doing freelance work and looking for a full-time job where I can work on more complex projects and improve my skills with bigger teams.

Here are a few technologies Iâ€™ve been working with recently:

  • Javascript (ES6+)
  • HTML/CSS
  • React
  • ExpressJS
  • NodeJS
  • MongoDB
02/ projects

Featured Projects

Movie-app
Movie-app

Web app built with vanilla JavaScript and bootstrap for browsing, searching, filtering and watching online movies. this app was built for the purpose of learning a lot of JavaScript features like XHR, HTTP Requests, Using a large API Library, asynchronous code, practicing higher order functions, and much more. The ui/ux also designed by me on adobe XD.

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Javascript
Minesweeper Game
Minesweeper Game

An online logic puzzle game built with vanilla JavaScript. Purposed to learn and practice functional programming, managing state, applying algorithms and debugging.

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Javascript
